text: Patrizia Sanvitale (born October 9, 1951 in Trieste), is an Italian journalist, author, blogger and sociologist. == Background == Patrizia Sanvitale graduated in Political Science at the University of Trieste. She won the Eurochocolate Prize for Best Book of chocolate (Il cioccolataio) in 2005.http://www.fondazionecologni.it/FCMA/index.php?id=40 == Bibliography == * Ho sognato California, Rizzoli, Milan, 2001; * Il tipografo, il Saggiatore, Milan, 2004; * Il cioccolataio, il Saggiatore, Milan, 2005; * Krapfen e misteri, PuzzleInk, Milan, 2009; * La mano che cura, Marsilio, Venice, 2011.http://www.oggi.it/video/benessere/2011/06/17/la-mano-che- cura/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tanpAcTeUV8http://archiviostorico.corriere.it/2011/luglio/23/corpo_parlante_co_9_110723021.shtml == External links == * == References == Category:Italian women journalists Category:21st-century Italian novelists Category:Italian women writers Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century women writers
